summary: Create a complete admin layout system for Vue 3 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS application with responsive sidebar, header, router configuration, and placeholder views
acceptance_criteria: AdminLayout.vue component created with sidebar, header, and main content area using Composition API and TypeScript
Header component implemented with user info display and sidebar toggle button
Vue Router configured with admin routes: /admin/dashboard, /admin/users, /admin/settings
Three placeholder view components created: DashboardView, UsersView, SettingsView
Sidebar toggle functionality working on desktop (collapse/expand)
Mobile responsive: hamburger menu opens sidebar as overlay on screens < 1024px
Existing Sidebar.vue component integrated into AdminLayout
App.vue updated to use router-view instead of HelloWorld
main.ts updated to initialize Vue Router instance
All components fully typed with TypeScript (no 'any' types)
Application builds successfully without TypeScript errors
Active route highlighting works in sidebar
Mobile overlay closes when clicking outside sidebar

steps.description: Create Header component with user info and toggle button
Create AdminLayout component integrating Sidebar and Header
Configure Vue Router with admin routes and layout

steps.deliverable: src/App.vue with router-view instead of HelloWorld

steps.description: Run TypeScript type check and build verification
steps.deliverable: Successful npm run type-check and npm run build
Documentation with component structure, usage guide, and recommendations
